name: Rempel Family Meatloaf
author: Connie Levesque
summary: Tired of boring old meat loaf?  Well give this one a try.  My husband won't eat any other meat loaf but mine.
ingredients: ½ cup crushed buttery round crackers
1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Stir the ground beef, crushed crackers, Cheddar cheese, and onion soup mix in a large bowl until well combined
Whisk the eggs, ketchup, and steak sauce in a separate bowl until smooth
Mix the eggs into the meat until evenly combined, if the mixture seems too dry, add a little water
Press into a 9x5 inch loaf pan
Bake in preheated oven until the meatloaf reaches 160 degrees F (71 degrees C) and is no longer pink in the center, 45 to 60 minutes
